attributes.action: Require accessible adult changing facilities at all public toilets
attributes.additional_details:
We believe provision of changing facilities are inadequate, and that this seriously limits the lives of those that need to use them. It can mean young people and adults are unable to access the community equally due to a chance of being unable to be changed whilst not at home.
 
Would you like to sit in soiled underwear for up to an hour until the nearest changing places? No. Neither do disabled young people and adults.
attributes.background: Make it law that there should be changing facilities equipped with a large changing bed and hoist wherever there are general public toilets, open 7 days a week, 24 hours a day. These should require a RADAR key to avoid vandalism.
